page.title: 13SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Gabriel Wicks was an old man of Hullavington, who was a hurdle maker,and did odd jobs for people. When he was a young man he went to Bradfield Farm with some thatching spars.Farmer Swete asked him to do a job for him.He wanted extra storage for grain and he had decided to use an empty room in the disused part of the house,but the window was broken and he wanted Wicks to board it up.Wicks was not aware that it was in the shape a church window.Wicks measured the window and prepared the wood.While he was nailing it up he thought how gloomy it was.He had nailed the last nail into place when he heard a laugh and the wood fell out.Swete made him nail it again but it fell out once more.They ran away into the orchard.Wicks later pulled the room down and nobody knows where it was.
